stats.strength.name: [key.stat.strength](Strength)
stats.strength.description:
[key.stat.strength](Strength) is responsible for damage scaling with [key.item_tag.heavy](Heavier) [key.flag.melee] weapons, but nearly all [key.flag.melee] weapons are scaled by it to an extent.
It also affects [key.stat.stamina](Stamina Costs), [key.stat.attack.knockback] & [key.stat.resistance.knockback], [key.stat.movement.jump_height] and [key.stat.misc.carry_weight].
stats.dexterity.name: [key.stat.dexterity](Dexterity)
stats.dexterity.description:
[key.stat.dexterity](Dexterity) is responsible for damage scaling with [key.item_tag.light](Lighter) [key.flag.melee] weapons and [key.flag.ranged] weapons.
It also affects [key.stat.attack.speed], [key.stat.stamina.regen] and [key.stat.movement.speed], to a lesser degree.
stats.constitution.name: [key.stat.constitution](Constitution)
stats.constitution.description: [key.stat.constitution](Constitution) is responsible for your [key.stat.health.max], [key.stat.stamina.max] and your [key.stat.health.heal_mult].
stats.mind.name: [key.stat.mind](Mind)
stats.mind.description: [key.stat.mind](Mind) is responsible for your [key.stat.magic.power], [key.stat.magic.speed] and reducing your [key.stat.concentration.cost](Concentration Costs).
stats.willpower.name: [key.stat.mind](Willpower)
stats.willpower.description: [key.stat.willpower](Willpower) is responsible for your [key.stat.concentration.max], [key.stat.concentration.regen], and a small amount of [key.stat.resistance.critical]
stats.luck.name: [key.stat.luck](Luck)
stats.luck.description:
[key.stat.luck](Luck) affects the quality of loot you may find in the dungeon.
Among many other small things...
stats.health_max.name: Maximum Health
stats.health_max.description: The maximum value your [key.stat.health] can reach.
stats.health_min.name: Minimum Health
stats.health_min.description:
The minimum value your [key.stat.health] can reach before you [key.mechanic.death](Die!)
Can be negative!
stats.health_regen.name: Health Regeneration
stats.health_regen.description:
How many points of [key.stat.health] you regain per second.
This stat is very difficult to obtain.
stats.health_regen_delay.name: Health Regeneration Delay
stats.health_regen_delay.description: The delay in seconds after taking damage before your [key.stat.health.regen] kicks in.
stats.heal_multiplier.name: Healing Multiplier
stats.heal_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for all [key.flag.healing] you receive.
stats.stamina_max.name: Maximum Stamina
stats.stamina_max.description: The maximum value your [key.stat.stamina] can reach.
stats.stamina_regen.name: Stamina Regeneration
stats.stamina_regen.description: How much [key.stat.stamina] you regain per second.
stats.stamina_regen_delay.name: Stamina Regeneration Delay
stats.stamina_regen_delay.description: The delay in seconds after spending [key.stat.stamina] (e.g. attacking, jumping) before your [key.stat.stamina.regen] kicks in.
stats.stamina_cost_multiplier.name: Stamina Cost Multiplier
stats.stamina_cost_multiplier.descriptio: Multiplies all [key.stat.stamina](Stamina Costs) you pay by this value.
stats.concentration_max.name: Maximum Concentration
stats.concentration_max.description: The maximum value your [key.stat.concentration] can reach.
stats.concentration_regen.name: Concentration Regeneration
stats.concentration_regen.description: How many points of [key.stat.concentration] you regain per second.
stats.concentration_regen_delay.name: Concentration Regeneration Delay
stats.concentration_regen_delay.descript: The delay in seconds after spending [key.stat.concentration] before your [key.stat.concentration.regen] kicks in.
stats.concentration_cost_multiplier.name: Concentration Cost Multiplier
stats.concentration_cost_multiplier.desc: Multiplies all [key.stat.concentration.cost](Concentration Costs) you pay by this value.
stats.posture_max.name: Maximum Posture
stats.posture_max.description: The maximum value your [key.stat.posture] can reach.
stats.posture_regen.name: Posture Regeneration
stats.posture_regen.description: How many points of [key.stat.posture] you regain per second.
stats.posture_regen_delay.name: Posture Regeneration Delay
stats.posture_regen_delay.description: The delay in seconds after taking [key.stat.posture](Posture Damage) (usually from blocking) before your [key.stat.posture.regen] kicks in.
stats.mana_max.name: Max Mana
stats.mana_max.description: The maximum amount of [key.stat.magic.mana] you can have.
stats.attack_power.name: Attack Power
stats.attack_power.description:
Your damage with most weapons will also scale off your [key.stat.attack.power].
[key.stat.attack.power] is rarely obtained naturally and is usually found on better equipment.
Higher quality weapons typically have better scaling for attack power.
stats.attack_speed.name: Attack Speed
stats.attack_speed.description:
The [key.flavour.important](percentage multiplier) for how quickly you can attack with weapons.
Even small amounts of [key.stat.attack.speed] (think [key.variable.static](1) - [key.variable.static](2%)) are very powerful, acting as a force multiplier to your potential damage.
Occasionally affects the speed at which you perform other actions, such as swapping weapons.
stats.spell_speed.name: Spellcasting Speed
stats.spell_speed.description: The percentage multiplier for how quickly you can cast [key.mechanic.spellcasting](Spells).
stats.move_speed_multiplier.name: Move Speed
stats.move_speed_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for how quickly you move.
stats.jump_height_multiplier.name: Jump Height
stats.jump_height_multiplier.description: The percentage multiplier for how high you can jump.
stats.spell_power.name: Spell Power
stats.spell_power.description:
Your baseline power when casting [key.mechanic.spellcasting](Spells).
Almost all [key.mechanic.spellcasting](Spells) will scale off your [key.stat.magic.power] in some way, but many specialized [key.mechanic.spellcasting](Spells) will scale off your other stats as well.

stats.critical_multiplier.name: Critical Multiplier
stats.critical_multiplier.description:
When scoring a [key.mechanic.critical_hit], the [key.mechanic.damage] it deals will be multiplied by this percentage.
Many enemies have [key.mechanic.weak_point](Weak Points) that will always score a [key.mechanic.critical_hit] when struck.
Most weapons and some spells are capable of scoring [key.mechanic.critical_hit](Criticals).
stats.knockback.name: Knockback
stats.knockback.description:
This score represents how far you'll move an enemy when you hit them.
It is reduced by the targets [key.stat.resistance.knockback].
stats.armor.name: Armor
stats.armor.description: All [key.flag.physical] damage you take is reduced by your [key.stat.defense.armor].
stats.warding.name: Ward
stats.warding.description: All [key.flag.magic] damage you take is reduced by your [key.stat.defense.ward].
stats.critical_negation.name: Critical Resistance
stats.critical_negation.description:
[key.mechanic.critical_hit](Critical Hits) you receive have their [key.stat.attack.critical_multiplier] reduced by this value.
This cannot reduce damage from a [key.mechanic.critical](Critical) below its regular damage.
